It was fun when it first came out, then the Developers realized that the survivors had to be able to 100% be able to bully the killer. Not even have some strengths against the killer, but the survivors should in fact be stronger than the killer, and therefore now the survivors have the ability (and 99% of the time do) bully the killer, or just troll for the fun of it and there's nothing anyone can do about it.

The dev's don't care, it's a dying game. It's a waste of time, and my money.

I used to defend the devs, now I don't care.

Your MMR is shit. Thanks for nothing.
nu e halal nu il cumpara

when is THE THING chapter coming out ;)

The only downside is wait time can be long to join a game (if you're not a killer).  And there doesn't seem to be anything to stop people from being AFK while being the killer.  It doesn't seem to be a hard thing to stop (check for movement?) but it ruins about 1/2 the games.  Which sucks because, again, you often wait a long time to join.

es buen juego, divierte esa atmosfera de tension continua. falta pulir algunos bugs pero sigue siendo divertido. lo unico malo es que hay personajes que si o si tenes que comprar mediante dlc de paga. valen la pena si los consigues en rebajas sobre todo como hice yo. 8/10
